cause.description:
The main goal of our organization is to promote awareness of the land promised to Israel & his descendants by the almighty God; vicariously protecting the land itself. Our ultimate goal is to restore the borders that The LORD proscribed in The Bible & restore them to there rightful owners; the Israeli peoples.
1. Reestablish the Holy borders.
2. Restore Israel as the proper owner of The Holy Land.
3. Support those protecting Gods land.
cause.mission: Promote awareness & protect the Promised Land of both Jews & Christians.
cause.name: Knights of Zion
